resources.string: This is what our section is made for. We will publish all the books of our department here, so that we can all benefit. Originally I created this app for this service. If everyone cooperates, we will definitely move forward.
This apps document is protected by HP3 software Limited copyright Laws. Reproduction and distribution of the presentation without written permission of the sponsor(HP3) is prohibited.

Assalamualaikum.\n I am Md. Zobayer Hasan Nayem. I am currently studying in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering in Bangladesh University Of Business and Technology (BUBT). I am working in app development as well as studying. I have an IT firm. (HP3 Software Solutions). If you have any problems using in this app, please contact me via email or Whatsapp.
